column5: planning to fish lake of bays in the next few weeks, any ice condition info would be very helpful..thanks
Lots and lots of ice, hopefully Wallico chimes in, he's been up there recently.
I was up past there yesterday.. lots of ice (from what I heard) and lots of water. Take from that what you will,,I wasnt out there just looking from shore.

Yep, I was up recently but it was the beginning of the the week before the thaw.   At the time there was lots of ice (18" or so) and close to a foot of snow on top.   At this point, I imagine it's pretty sloppy...ie a fair amount of water and slush.
I was on Lake Muskoka yesterday, and there was tons of ice....little bit of a crust on top from all the water...but easy walking and a solid 18" of ice.
